title: As a state retiree I used to be charged 440/mo by state to also cover my wife\'s insurance. I enrolled her individually w/BCBS same med/rx coverage for only 220/mo. With the state\'s purchasing power, how can that be??? The state also says it pays 345/mo for my insurance, but I know I can get my own BCBS coverage for much less. What\'s up with this. Who\'s negotiating rates for the state??
